featured.text: Which of the following statements can be inferred from the article?
The author's statement about the highway fence's ability to retain a smaller and lighter car (A) is the author's assumption.
From the statement “But … most people don’t take any notice of the doctor's advice!”
Which of the following statements is explicitly mentioned in the passage? (A) Amy’s father planted carnations in the garden.
Wearing a bindi has become more of a fashion statement than a religious custom.

definition.en_def: A clear expression of something in speech or writing.
definition.example: The statement was read aloud to the audience.
